android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL.description: Allows an application to know what content is playing and control its playback.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.permission.RECEIVE_BO.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.SET_ALARM.description: Allows the application to set an alarm in an installed alarm clock application. Some alarm clock applications may not implement this feature.

com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.description: Allows the application to set an alarm in an installed alarm clock application. Some alarm clock applications may not implement this feature.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTER.description: Permission an application must hold in order to use

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (androidx.work.impl.background.systemjob.SystemJobService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.

playstore_details.title: Free Radio, Sports, Music, News, Talk & Podcasts
playstore_details.description:
RADIO.COM brings you unlimited free radio!

Stream sports, music, news, talk and comedy radio stations and podcasts, anytime, anywhere, free. Choose from hundreds of stations on the radio!

WHAT’S NEW?

Now, with RADIO.COM Rewind, you can go back in time up to 24 hours and listen to anything you may have missed or want to hear again. On the station page, you can pause, rewind 15 seconds, an hour, a segment or anywhere you want to start within the last 24 hours.

Want to catch up faster? RADIO.COM Rewind lets you choose a playback speed so you can listen up to 2.0x faster and catch up with us live! RADIO.COM Rewind is radio the WAY you want, WHEN you want. 

Listen to RADIO.COM free:

More than 500 FM radio, AM radio, and HD radio stations
Listen across home and auto devices, including AirPlay and CarPlay 
Hear RADIO.COM exclusive interviews, music world premieres, and stand-up comedy
Get sports news and pre/post game coverage from MLB, NFL, NHL, NBA and college teams
Stream on-demand radio shows and listen at your leisure

Traveling? Download podcasts to listen without wifi on-the-go
Curate your favorites and receive recommendations based on your favorite radio stations and podcast subscriptions
Search by location, genre or category to explore top-rated content
Wake up to your favorite station with the alarm feature
Unlimited free radio streaming of more than 500 stations nationwide.

Discover new music and entertainment:

Hear new songs and greats artists from all station genres including Rock, Hip-Hop R&B, Pop, Alternative, Country and more
Catch music artist world premieres and interviews on: WAAF, KROQ, 98.7 KLUV, KISW and more

Access exclusive HD radio stations like Comedy Now, Flashback Alt, and Smokin’ Oldies
RADIO.COM offers the largest selection of Sports Talk stations of any free radio app, including WEEI, WFAN, 94.1 WIP, CBS Sports Radio!

Listen to NFL Season Coverage and get updates on your favorite football teams from anywhere:

Philadelphia Eagles on 94.1 WIP
49ers on 957 The Game
Detroit Lions on 971 The Ticket
Green Bay Packers on 1057 FM The Fan
Dallas Cowboys on 1053 The Fan
Chicago Bears on 670 The Score and more!
Keep up with all your local and national news, traffic, and weather. Listen to WWL radio, KYW 1060, WWJ radio, 1010 Wins, KMOX, or WCBS 880 at home, work or on your commute.

Stream more than 11,000 podcasts, on-demand, free.

Subscribe and download your favorites like:

Mooch and the Mrs. with Anthony and Deidre Scaramucci
The Kevin & Bean Show on KROQ
Pod Save America
48 Hours
The Sports Junkies
Skimm'd from The Couch
Sarah and Vinnie Full Show
Boomer & Gio 
Mike Francesa and more!

RADIO.COM is the ultimate free radio app for streaming FM radio, AM radio, and HD radio stations. No matter where you are, listen to any city’s local radio!
Listen across home and auto devices, including Amazon Echo with Alexa, Google Home, AirPlay and CarPlay. 

——— Download RADIO.COM for Free Now ———

What others are saying about RADIO.COM:

“This app is simply fantastic! I love that I can listen to my favorite stations from all over the country. The new rewind is an awesome feature. I cannot tell you how many times I wished that I could rewind a broadcast to hear what I missed..” - Frank Alfieri

“I absolutely LOVE the REWIND feature. I'm shocked it's a free app! Thank You for the upgraded features!” - Hannah Cruise


———

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s audience measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, such as Nielsen’s TV Ratings.
To learn more about our digital audience measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

——— Get the app now and start listening to all your favorite radio stations ———
playstore_details.summary: Free Radio Stations - Sport, Music, News, Talk. Over 500 stations, 11k podcasts
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Free Radio Stations - Sport, Music, News, Talk. Over 500 stations, 11k podcasts
